contestDescription: Compete to become a future business leader. Present your strategies and visions for the business world of tomorrow.
taskSubmissionText: Submit a comprehensive proposal outlining your business strategies and future visions.

contestDescription: Showcase cutting-edge medical innovations in this contest. Propose solutions that can revolutionize medical practices.
taskSubmissionText: Submit a research paper detailing your innovative medical solutions and their potential impact.

contestDescription: Unleash your imagination in this article writing contest. Write captivating pieces that transport readers to new worlds.
taskSubmissionText: Submit an imaginative article, story, or essay that showcases your unique perspective and creativity.

contestDescription: Immerse yourself in the virtual gaming extravaganza. Compete in a variety of gaming challenges and claim victory!
taskSubmissionText: Participate in diverse gaming challenges. Submit gameplay videos and achievements to prove your gaming prowess.

contestDescription: Engage in the CodeCraft Coding Marathon. Showcase your coding skills in a marathon of challenging programming problems.
taskSubmissionText: Solve a series of coding challenges within the given time frame. Submit your code and explanations for evaluation.
